archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.5.6b: b) limiting the amount of information stored on endpoint devices (e.g. by using a new build or securely deleting all information previously stored on the device before travelling)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
